title: Coronavirus: 9 samples of UK mutant strain, 4 double mutant found in Jharkhand
description: Ranchi (Jharkhand) [India], April 15 (ANI): Nine samples of UK mutant strain and four of the double mutant variant of coronavirus were found in Jharkhand on Wednesday.

title: Jharkhand: A wailing daughter tells the tale of sorry health infrastructure
description: This incident, in a nutshell, tells the state of affairs in a state that has seen a rapid surge in cases reported over the last three weeks – one of a crumbling health infrastructure, with more than 90 per cent ICU beds occupied in both public and private hospitals.

title: Govt again denies vaccine shortage as Indian states stare at stock crisis
description: The list of states which have flagged the shortage and sought re-stocking from the Centre includes Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Odisha, Andhra Pradesh, Punjab, Delhi, Rajasthan, Jharkhand, Uttarakhand and Assam.

title: Corona infected patient reached Jharkhand without investigation, died  | Ranchi NYOOOZ
description: A Covid 19 infected person died on Tuesday night in Baheri village of Hunterganj block. Four people who came in contact with him are being searched. However, he has not been identified yet. The deceased worked in the national capital, Delhi.

title: 4 samples from Jharkhand found infected with double mutant variant of Covid-19 virus
description: Four of the 39 samples from Jharkhand that were analysed for genome sequencing were found to be infected with the new double mutant variant of the virus causing Covid-19.

title: 3 members of family killed in Jharkhand road accident
description: Medininagar, Apr 14 (PTI) Three members of a family were killed when their car collided head-on with a truck in Jharkhand's Medininagar district, police said on Wednesday.

title: India’s Migrants Flee to Their Villages as Covid-19 Prompts New Lockdown
description: As the coronavirus roars back in India, migrant workers who had just started to resettle in cities they left during last year’s outbreak are packing up to return to their villages again.

description: Ranchi Divisional Commissioner (DC) Chhavi Ranjan said that the electric crematorium will be fixed at the earliest but until then bodies are being cremated on the banks of the Ghaghara river in Ranchi’s Namkum.

title: Jharkhand: 50% of all hospital beds to be reserved for Covid-19 patients

title: 50 pc beds in all Jharkhand hospitals to be reserved for COVID-19 patients
description: Ranchi (Jharkhand) [India], April 12 (ANI): Jharkhand Health Secretary KK Soan on Monday directed deputy commissioners of all districts to reserve at least 50 per cent beds of their capacity in hospitals for COVID-19 patients.

title: Transgenders demand for separate wards at hospitals in Jharkhand
description: According to Amarjeet, there are separate beds for transgenders in some of the neighbouring states but such facilities are missing here in Jharkhand.

title: On reproduction metric, Covid can be spreading faster in UP, Jharkhand and Bihar
description: The national average for the R-value, or reproduction number, one of the parameters of Covid-19 transmission, is 1.32, indicating that one infected person spreads the virus to more than one but less than two people.

title: Jharkhand: Over 2 million beneficiaries inoculated
description: The state on Sunday achieved the feat of inoculating over two million people with the first dose of Covid-19 vaccine, a milestone achieved 85 days after the nationwide launch of the mass vaccination programme, according to the state health department’s bulletin

title: Amid surge in Covid-19 cases, UP closes schools for Classes 1 to 12 till Apr 30

title: Jharkhand monitoring Covid-19 situation carefully: Health minister Banna Gupta
